description.collapsedText: "The Google Pixel 6 Pro is Google's bigger premium Google Pixel 6 with a 6.71" screen size and for the first time in an Google Pixel, it comes with a 120Hz ProMotion display for super smooth scrolling. The list of innovations includes a more capable triple camera setup, with a wide, ultra-wide and zoom cameras, as well as a LiDAR scanner.
description.captionText: *Please note that all functions, features, specs and any other product information provided on any Google and subsidiary platform, including but not limited to, benefits, design, pricing, components, performance, availability and capabilities describing the product are subject to change and changed by the company when deemed necessary without any notice or obligation.

contents.content:
About this item
• Unlocked Android cell phone gives you the flexibility to change carriers and choose your own data plan[1]; the new, redesigned Pixel 6 Pro is the smartest and fastest Pixel yet[2]
• The powerful Google Tensor processor is the first processor designed by Google and made for Pixel; takes performance to a whole new level
• Advanced camera system with wide and ultrawide lenses, 4x optical zoom, and a main sensor that captures 150% more light[3]
• Pixel’s Magic Eraser[4], Motion Mode, and Portrait Mode professional tools keep your photos sharp, accurate, and focused; Face Unblur can deblur a face to make it sharper[5]
• Pixel’s fast charging all day battery adapts to you and saves power for apps you use the most [6,7]
• Keeps your phone protected with the next gen Titan M2 chip, 5 years of security updates[8], and the most hardware layers of any phone[9]
• New Pixel experience is more modern and intuitive, with colors that reflect your personal style; the At a Glance feature shows you the apps and info you need when you need it, like a boarding pass before a flight[10]
• With Live Translate, Pixel translates private chats and messages, live video captions, and signs in up to 55 languages right on your cell phone[11]; no apps, internet, or language courses required[12]
• New 6.7 inch LTPO Smooth Display[13] is made with the toughest Gorilla Glass yet[14], so your smartphone stays protected; get more responsive gaming and scrolling with up to a 120Hz refresh rate[15]
• Please refer to the product description section below for all applicable legal disclaimers denoted by the bracketed numbers in the preceding bullet points (e.g., [1], [2], etc.)

comments.title: Was waiting for a few months before review
comments.comment: First impression is good so far. The battery life lasts long. The screen looks great and the picture looks good. Camera looks clear and the fingerprint scanner works well. No issues from the manufacture so I’m happy. The curved screen is really cool. I used to have an iPhone 5s before upgrading. Huge improvement for me.

data.Features: Scratch-resistant glass (Corning Gorilla Glass Victus), Ambient light sensor, Proximity sensor

data.Charging: Fast charging, Qi wireless charging, Reverse wireless charging

data.Materials: Back: Glass (Corning Gorilla Glass Victus); Frame: Metal
data.Colors: Stormy Black, Cloudy White, Sorta Sunny

data.Wi-Fi: 802.11 a, b, g, n, ac, ax (Wi-Fi 6); MIMO, Wi-Fi Direct, Hotspot
data.Location: GPS, A-GPS, Glonass, Galileo, QZSS, Cell ID, Wi-Fi positioning

data.In The Box: 1 m USB-C to USB-C cable (USB 2.0), Quick Start Guide, Quick Switch Adapter, SIM tool

description.collapsedText: "The iPhone 13 Pro is Apple's smaller premium iPhone with a 6.1" screen size and for the first time in an iPhone, it comes with a 120Hz ProMotion display for super smooth scrolling. The list of innovations includes a more capable triple camera setup, with a wide, ultra-wide and zoom cameras, as well as a LiDAR scanner.

comments.title: Perfect refurbished phone
comments.comment: This phone would have been perfect had it been unlocked for my use with ATT. It was in perfect condition and so flawless. I'm sick that I couldn't keep it. Whoever has Verizon will love this particular device. Truly a beautiful phone.

comments.title: Great
comments.comment: It’s dope it’s perfect it’s came fully unlocked I got to put my SIM card in✊🏿I’m in love with it delivered faster than it said.

data.Features: HDR support, Oleophobic coating, Scratch-resistant glass (Ceramic Shield), Ambient light sensor, Proximity sensor

data.Charging: USB Power Delivery, Qi wireless charging, MagSafe wireless charging

data.Features: OIS, HDR, Time-lapse video, Continuous autofocus, Picture-taking during video recording, Video light

data.Keys: Left: Volume control, Other; Right: Lock/Unlock key

data.Data Speed: LTE-A, HSDPA+ (4G) 42.2 Mbit/s, HSUPA 5.76 Mbit/s, UMTS

data.Wi-Fi: 802.11 a, b, g, n, ac, ax (Wi-Fi 6), dual-band; MIMO, Wi-Fi Direct, Hotspot
data.Location: GPS, A-GPS, Glonass, Galileo, BeiDou, QZSS, Cell ID, Wi-Fi positioning
data.Sensors: Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Compass, Barometer, LiDAR scanner
